Here are the most important economic and financial dates from 01.11.2019 - 28.11.2019:

01 Nov 2019, 06:30

11.1. FSO: retail sales September 2019 FSO: consumer price index October 2019 Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) October 2019 MK Seco: First report on the obligation to register a job04.11. Call 11.00 am) Dufry: Q3 result (Conf. Call 14.00) Burckhardt: Result H1 2019/20 Lem: Result H1 2019/20 (Conf. Call 10 am) Lucerne KB: Result Q3 Oerlikon: Result Q3 (Conf.
